original_text: One day, Elisha came to Shunem again. He went up to the room on the roof. He lay down to rest there.
korean_text: 하루는 엘리사가 거기에 이르러 그 방에 들어가 누웠더니

sentences.original_text: One day, Elisha came to Shunem again.
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날, 엘리사가 다시 수넴에 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He went up to the room on the roof.
He lay down to rest there.
